sentences.en: Call up and order some ice for the mint julep. "
sentences.cn: 打个电话要点冰来做薄荷酒. ”

sentences.en: coins issued by the Royal Mint
sentences.cn: 皇家铸币局发行的硬币

sentences.en: Combine the beans, chopped mint and olive oil in a large bowl.
sentences.cn: 将菜豆、切碎的薄荷和橄榄油放在大碗里搅拌。

sentences.en: Decorate with a sprig of mint .
sentences.cn: 用小薄荷枝装饰。

sentences.en: Everybody thinks I'm making a mint.
sentences.cn: 人人都认为我要发大财了。

sentences.en: Garnish with mint sprigs.
sentences.cn: 用薄荷枝装点。

sentences.en: He has a mint of money.
sentences.cn: 他有的是钱.

sentences.en: I decorated the fruit salad with a sprig of mint.
sentences.cn: 我用小薄荷枝装点水果色拉。

sentences.en: In 1965 the mint stopped putting silver in dimes.
sentences.cn: 1965年，铸币厂停止向10分硬币中加入银的成分。

sentences.en: Many years later, the temple erected in her name was used to house the Roman mint.
sentences.cn: 多年后，以她的名义建造的寺庙被改造成了罗马铸币厂。

sentences.en: new potatoes sprinkled with chopped mint
sentences.cn: 撒上薄荷屑的嫩马铃薯

sentences.en: Only 2,000 of the special commemorative coins are being minted.
sentences.cn: 这种特别纪念币只有2,000枚在铸造中。

sentences.en: roast lamb with mint sauce
sentences.cn: 配薄荷调味汁的烤羔羊肉

sentences.en: Sage and mint are herbs.
sentences.cn: 鼠尾草、薄荷均为药草.

sentences.en: The mint is coining pennies.
sentences.cn: 造币厂正在铸造每枚价值一便士的硬币。

sentences.en: The mint makes coins.
sentences.cn: 铸币厂制造硬币.

sentences.en: The Romans learned to mint from the Greeks.
sentences.cn: 罗马人从希腊人那里学会了铸造钱币.

sentences.en: The Royal Mint will strike a gold coin of commemorative.
sentences.cn: 英国皇家造币厂将铸造一种纪念金币.

sentences.en: These pennies were coined at the mint in London.
sentences.cn: 这些便士钱币是伦敦一家制币厂铸造的.

sentences.en: They were worth a mint.
sentences.cn: 它们价值不菲。
